title: UBS weighs wealth tie-up to compete in cutthroat Indian market
description: UBS Group AG is considering partnerships for wealth management in India to navigate the competitive market. Options include buying a stake in a local firm for a joint venture. This move aims to expand UBS's reach among India's wealthy, following its recent acquisition of Credit Suisse's team.
